messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Good Choices etc
messages.msgSnippet: Hi again I certainly am not trying to imply that some of you are liers! Just that we sometimes forget the journey we made to get to where we are! I was made
messages.messageBody:
Hi again
I certainly am not trying to imply that some of you are liers! Just that we
sometimes forget the journey we made to get to where we are! I was made
freshly aware of this recently, talking to a good friend who is thinking of
homeschooling...
Thanks for all your patient responses to my many questions - I am really
excited because they confirm what I was thinking anyway; I'm on the right
track YAHOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.
Regards
Cathy

> > part of what she questions
> > should be questioned, "is everyone entirely honest about this."
>
> It's a good question but I don't think there's a good answer! If someone
is
> lying about her children then she's going to lie about whether she's being
> truthful ;-)
